description: Enable clicking the entire mood board block/node to open the details/analysis side panel, not just the Details button. Must not conflict with drag behavior on the React Flow canvas.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a mood board block opens the side panel
Click does not conflict with drag behavior

steps.description: Add click handler to block node
steps.details: In the React Flow custom node component, add an onClick handler that opens the selected item's side panel. Set the selected item ID in state.
Use React Flow's onNodeClick callback (fires only for clicks, not drags). Alternatively, track mousedown/mouseup position delta to distinguish click from drag.
The Details button's onClick should stopPropagation to prevent double-triggering. Both paths should open the same side panel.

technicalNotes: React Flow provides onNodeClick which only fires for actual clicks (not drag start)
Side panel is likely the analysis panel component in the moodboard page
